name: Indian-Style Grilled Chicken Salad
author: Aisha
summary: Grilled tandoori chicken on a fresh salad with a little tangy lemon dressing.  You can find the tandoori spice at any Indian store or possibly a local grocery store.
ingredients: ½ cup chopped green bell pepper
directions: Preheat an outdoor grill for high heat and lightly oil grate
Combine the hot sauce, chili powder, coriander, tandoori paste, oregano, vinegar, lemon juice, and oil in a small bowl
Coat each piece of chicken with the sauce, then discard remaining sauce
Cook the chicken on the grill until juices run clear and the chicken is cooked through, approximately 10 to 15 minutes
Prepare the dressing by mixing the lemon juice, vinegar, hot sauce, salt and pepper in a small bowl; set aside
For the salad, combine the lettuce, tomatoes, onion, radishes, carrots, and pepper in a large bowl
Slice the cooked chicken and add to the salad
